attributes.action: Declare Pakistan a terrorist state and stop all Uk aids going to pakistan.
attributes.additional_details: Author Gordon Thomas states that whilst aiding in the capture of Al Qaeda members, Pakistan "still sponsored terrorist groups in the disputed state of Kashmir, funding, training and arming them in their war of attrition against India".US.Democratic presidential nominee Hillary Clinton has expressed concern over the possibility of Pakistan's nuclear weapons falling into the hands of jihadists,they're going to get access to nuclear weapons, and you'll have suicide nuclear bombers.
attributes.background: Former Prime Minister David Cameron accused the Pakistani government of double standards: for promoting terrorism and sponsoring it by using foreign aid. There are enough evidences to prove that pakistan government harbour terrorism and their safe havens, by misusing foreign aids.
